mails_details.Subject: An email
mails_details.body: Tuvalu, formerly known as the Ellice Islands, is located midway between Hawaii and Australia in the South Pacific Ocean.

paises.name: France
paises.description: France, the largest country in Western Europe, has long been a gateway between the continent's northern and southern regions.

paises.name: India
paises.description: India (Hindi: Bhārat), officially the Republic of India (Hindi: Bhārat Gaṇarājya) is a country in South Asia.

paises.name: Germany
paises.description: Germany is a country located in the heart of Western Europe.

paises.name: Portugal
paises.description: Portugal is a country full of wonders — charming castles, pristine beaches, and a metropolitan capital spattered in remnants of the past.

paises.name: Canada
paises.description: Canada is a vast and rugged land. From north to south it spans more than half the Northern Hemisphere.

paises.name: Brazil
paises.description: Brazil is the largest country in South America and the fifth largest nation in the world.

paises.name: Mexico
paises.description: Mexico is a land of extremes, with high mountains and deep canyons in the center of the country, sweeping deserts in the north, and dense rain forests in the south and east.

paises.name: United States
paises.description: The United States of America is the world's third largest country in size and nearly the third largest in terms of population.

paises.name: Tuvalu
paises.description: Tuvalu, formerly known as the Ellice Islands, is located midway between Hawaii and Australia in the South Pacific Ocean.
